channel.title: Adding spell to trident and kraken
channel.description:
I recently added the trident staff to my pi 317 and instead of the actual 2007 spell i was just ganno use the water wave spell as a replication what i was thinking is adding the ice blitz anim to start off the spell and the water wave just shoots out, i just dont know how to use write that, or where.
Also i added krakens i wanted it to just shoot out fire waves
Please help me
